name: Waterford Press Outdoor Knots 2nd Edition
description: Rigging a tarp. Hanging your food away from critters. Securing your canoe to the shore. Knots are essential to outdoor life. This compact and weatherproof guide walks you step-by-step through the most useful knots, hitches, splices and lashings. It includes multiple variations and instructions for both right and left handers.Waterproof fold-out design.Dimensions are 21 x 10cm.
